meanings.definition: To surpass in studying or learning.
meanings.sent1: She is outstudying her classmates by reading extra books.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys outstudying his friends to impress his teacher.
meanings.sent3: The student was outstudying so much that they finished all their homework before dinner.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to outstudying is like a shining beacon in the classroom.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying requires focus and determination to achieve academic success.

meanings.definition: To study more than someone else.
meanings.sent1: They are outstudying their peers to prepare for the exam.
meanings.sent2: You can improve your grades by outstudying your siblings.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were playfully outstudying each other to see who could finish first.
meanings.sent4: Outstudying in this group means being the most dedicated to learning.
meanings.sent5: Outstudying is a great way to stay ahead in your studies.
